= Level Data =

*Endianess*: Little endian, Intel, Lowest byte first.

|| *Offset* || *Size (bytes)* || *Type* || *Description* ||
|| 0x000 || 4 || <pre>char[4]</pre> || Magic (="MTUA") ||
|| 0x004 || 4 || <pre>byte[4]</pre> || Custom CRC-32 (Still unknown) ||
|| 0x008 || 4 || uint32 || Always equals 7 ||
|| 0x00C || 16 || <pre>byte[16]</pre> || Zeros ||
|| 0x01C || 22 || <pre>wchar[11]</pre> || Author's name`*` (UTF-16) ||
|| 0x032 || 34 || <pre>wchar[17]</pre> || Level's name`*` (UTF-16) ||
|| 0x054 || 1 || byte || Zero ||
|| 0x055 || 4 || uint32 || Difficulty ||
|| 0x059 || 7 || <pre>byte[7]</pre> || Some signature (=0x042C0920010000)||
|| 0x060 || 10 || <pre>byte[10]</pre> || Palette data ||
|| 0x06A || 6 || <pre>byte[6]</pre> || Zero padding ||
|| 0x070 || 4 || uint32 || Number of gadgets ||
|| 0x074 || 88 || <pre>gadget[22]</pre> || Gadgets array** ||
|| 0x0CC || 512 || <pre>byte[512]</pre> || Level data (Rastered, bottom to top) ||
|| 0x2CC || 1 || byte || Protection (4=locked, 3=open) ||
|| 0x2CD || 3 || <pre>byte[3]</pre> || Footer (=0xFAFF0f) ||
|| *0x2D0* || *720* || || *Summary* ||

<pre>*</pre>All strings are nullified so last wchar equals 0.

<pre>**</pre>All gadgets are sorted by type (The flag will always be first).
